root.title: Azure Application Gateway Modified or Deleted
root.description: Identifies when a application gateway is modified or deleted.
root.author: Austin Songer

falsepositives.item: Application gateway being modified or deleted may be performed by a system administrator.
Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment.
Application gateway modified or deleted from unfamiliar users should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
